page.title: 16LIVING AROUND FIVE ASHES
page.content: MOST PEOPLE CHOOSE TO LIVE HERE BECAUSE OF THE OPEN FIELDS AND THE BEAUTIFUL VIEWS. IT IS CONVENIENT FOR PEOPLE WHO WORK IN LONDON AND WANT TO COME HOME IN THE EVENING TO THE PEACE AND QUIET OF THE COUNTRYSIDE. THE FRIENDLINESS AND COMMUNITY SPIRIT WHICH MANIFEST THEMSELVES THROUGH ACTIVITIES ORGANISED BY VARIOUS GROUPS OR SOCIETIES MAKE THIS AN ENJOYABLE PLACE TO LIVE IN.IT IS NEAR THE COAST WHICH IS CONVENIENT FOR LEISURE AND TRAVEL ABROAD VIA THE CHANNEL PORTS. THE POPULATION IS ALMOST EQUALLY DIVIDED BETWEEN PEOPLE WHO MOVED INTO THE AREA IN THE LAST 10 YEARS AND OTHERS WHO SETTLED HERE IN THE FIFTIES AND SIXTIES. PARENTS PLUS ONE OR TWO CHILDREN MAKE UP AN AVERAGE HOUSEHOLD. GIVEN A CHOICE, 90% OF THOSE ASKED WOULD STAY IN THE AREA RATHER THAN MOVE ELSEWHERE.
